product_name: Deuter Freerider Pro 28 SL Pack - Women's
long_description: The Deuter Freerider Pro 28 SL pack brings together a comfortable, women-specific fit with snow-specific options galore for pursuing powdery pleasure in the backcountry with skis, board or snowshoes.
